rules.natural: Provided that the publication is approved, the operation will be compliant.
Given that an environmental assessment is conducted in the region, a safety inspection is conducted at the facility.
A safety inspection at the facility leads to material testing being performed on the material.
Material testing on the material results in community approval being granted for the region.
Community approval for the region ensures that the mining operation is permitted if it meets requirements.
Certification of the facility means it is operational.
Either the facility is certified or it has a temporary permit.
Issuance of a temporary permit for the facility necessitates emergency repairs being conducted there.
Approval of the document results in the operation being compliant.
An open investigation for the company means that a compliance extension is not granted.
A routine audit at the facility leads to the operation being compliant.
A routine audit is conducted at the facility or a special inspection is conducted there.
If an appeal is filed by the company, then the penalty being waived follows from the absence of the special inspection leading to compliance.
Retention of legal counsel by the company leads to an appeal being filed.
Self-representation by the company leads to an appeal being filed.
Submission of the publication results in its approval.
The publication is submitted or the document is submitted.
Submission of evidence by the company prevents a default judgment.
Evidence is submitted by the company or testimony is provided by the company.
Provision of testimony by the company prevents a default judgment.
Either the license is revoked for the company, or the license is suspended, or the operation is compliant.
A valid permit for the company means its license is not revoked.
The company has a pending renewal, or an expired permit, or a valid permit.
If an attorney files for the company, then dismissal is granted provided that the environmental complaint does not lead to the hazard report implying emergency repairs result in compliance.
Submission of the document leads to its review.
If the company files pro se, then dismissal is granted provided that the environmental complaint does not lead to the hazard report implying emergency repairs result in compliance.
Completion of the appeal for the company implies that either an attorney filed or the company filed pro se.
A violation is proven against the company or a default judgment is not entered.
Presentation of counter evidence by the company prevents a violation from being proven.
Provision of witness testimony by the company prevents a violation from being proven.
Submission of an expert report by the company leads to counter evidence being presented.
An expert report is submitted by the company or an employee statement is provided.
Notarization of the company’s documents means that an employee statement leads to witness testimony.
The company’s documents are notarized or verified.
Verification of the company’s documents means that an employee statement leads to witness testimony.
A renewal application is submitted by the company or an automatic extension is granted.
An automatic extension for the company leads to a valid permit.
Approval of the renewal for the company means that a renewal application leads to a valid permit.
Possibility of an appeal for the company leads to denial of the renewal.
Rejection of the document leads to rejection of the publication.
Permission of the mining operation leads to compliance of the operation.
Application for the mining operation leads to it meeting requirements.
Absence of a violation notice or the hazard report implying emergency repairs lead to compliance results in a compliance extension.
Absence of legal counsel or self-representation leads to a default judgment.
Absence of the review leading to approval results in rejection of the document.
Denial of renewal approval leads to possibility of an appeal.
Denial of renewal approval leads to the renewal not being denied.

The company does not have a pending renewal.
Dismissal is not granted for the company.
